mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.impl.SerialLastInfoMgmtMapper.selectOrderBasicInfoByOrderId] 20191125 - KR OHK*/ SELECT A.SALES_ORD_ID ORD_ID ,A.SALES_ORD_NO ORD_NO ,D.STK_CODE ,D.STK_DESC ,D.STK_GRAD ,A.CUST_ID ,C.NAME CUST_NAME FROM SAL0001D A JOIN SAL0002D B ON B.SALES_ORD_ID = A.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0029D C ON C.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID JOIN SYS0026M D ON D.STK_ID = B.ITM_STK_ID WHERE A.SALES_ORD_NO = #{orderNo}

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.SerialLastInfoMgmtMapper.checkSerialLastInfoValid] 20191125 - KR OHK*/ SELECT A.DUP_CNT, B.VALID_REQST_CNT, C.VALID_DELVRY_CNT, D.VALID_SCAN_CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS DUP_CNT FROM LOG0100M WHERE SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo}) A, (SELECT SUM(CNT) VALID_REQST_CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM LOG0047M WHERE REQST_NO = #{lastReqstNo} UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM HMC0009M WHERE HMC_GR_NO = #{lastReqstNo} )) B, (SELECT COUNT(1) AS VALID_DELVRY_CNT FROM LOG0055D WHERE DELVRY_NO = #{lastDelvryNo}) C, (SELECT COUNT(1) AS VALID_SCAN_CNT FROM LOG0099D WHERE SCAN_NO = #{tempScanNo} AND SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo}) D
mapper.insert: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.SerialLastInfoMgmtMapper.saveSerialLastInfo] 20191125 - KR OHK*/ MERGE INTO LOG0100M A USING(SELECT #{serialNo} AS SERIAL_NO , #{lastLocId} AS LAST_LOC_ID , #{itmCode} AS ITM_CODE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{lastDelvryGrDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 'YYYYMMDD') AS LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT , #{lastLocStkGrad} AS LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD , #{lastCustId} AS LAST_CUST_ID , #{lastSalesOrdId} AS LAST_SALES_ORD_ID , #{stusCode} AS STUS_CODE , #{lastReqstNo} AS LAST_REQST_NO , #{lastReqstNoItm} AS LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , #{lastDelvryNo} AS LAST_DELVRY_NO , #{lastDelvryNoItm} AS LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM , #{tempScanNo} AS TEMP_SCAN_NO , #{userId} AS CRT_USER_ID , SYSDATE AS CRT_DT , #{userId} AS UPD_USER_ID , SYSDATE AS UPD_DT FROM DUAL) B ON(A.SERIAL_NO = B.SERIAL_NO) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.LAST_LOC_ID = B.LAST_LOC_ID , A.ITM_CODE = B.ITM_CODE , A.LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT = B.LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT , A.LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD = B.LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD , A.LAST_CUST_ID = B.LAST_CUST_ID , A.LAST_SALES_ORD_ID = B.LAST_SALES_ORD_ID , A.STUS_CODE = B.STUS_CODE , A.LAST_REQST_NO = B.LAST_REQST_NO , A.LAST_REQST_NO_ITM = B.LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , A.LAST_DELVRY_NO = B.LAST_DELVRY_NO , A.LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM = B.LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM , A.TEMP_SCAN_NO = B.TEMP_SCAN_NO , A.UPD_USER_ID = B.UPD_USER_ID , A.UPD_DT = B.UPD_DT WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(A.SERIAL_NO , A.LAST_LOC_ID , A.ITM_CODE , A.LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT , A.LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD , A.LAST_CUST_ID , A.LAST_SALES_ORD_ID , A.STUS_CODE , A.LAST_REQST_NO , A.LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , A.LAST_DELVRY_NO , A.LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM , A.TEMP_SCAN_NO , A.CRT_USER_ID , A.CRT_DT , A.UPD_USER_ID , A.UPD_DT )VALUES( B.SERIAL_NO , B.LAST_LOC_ID , B.ITM_CODE , B.LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT , B.LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD , B.LAST_CUST_ID , B.LAST_SALES_ORD_ID , B.STUS_CODE , B.LAST_REQST_NO , B.LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , B.LAST_DELVRY_NO , B.LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM , B.TEMP_SCAN_NO , B.CRT_USER_ID , B.CRT_DT , B.UPD_USER_ID , B.UPD_DT )

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.SerialLastInfoMgmtMapper.insertSerialLastInfoHistory] 20191125 - KR OHK*/ INSERT INTO LOG0101H --Serial Numbers Info Master History ( SERIAL_NO --serial number , SEQ --seq , LAST_LOC_ID --Last location id , ITM_CODE --Material code , LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT --Last Delivery GR Date , LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD --Stock Grade , LAST_CUST_ID --customerid , LAST_SALES_ORD_ID --SalesOrderID , STUS_CODE --Status Code , LAST_REQST_NO , LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , LAST_DELVRY_NO --delivery , LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM --delivery item , TEMP_SCAN_NO --temp mapping scan number , CRT_USER_ID --name of person who created the object , CRT_DT --date on which record was created , UPD_USER_ID --update User id , UPD_DT --update date ) SELECT SERIAL_NO --serial number , (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0)+1 AS SEQ FROM LOG0101H WHERE SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo}) , LAST_LOC_ID --Last location id , ITM_CODE --Material code , LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT --Last Delivery GR Date , LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD --Stock Grade , LAST_CUST_ID --customerid , LAST_SALES_ORD_ID --SalesOrderID , STUS_CODE --Status Code , LAST_REQST_NO , LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , LAST_DELVRY_NO --delivery , LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM --delivery item , TEMP_SCAN_NO --temp mapping scan number , #{userId} --name of person who created the object , SYSDATE , #{userId} --update User id , SYSDATE FROM LOG0100M WHERE SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo}
mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.impl.SerialLastInfoMgmtMapper.selectSerialLastInfoHistoryList] 20200116 - KR OHK*/ SELECT A.SERIAL_NO ,A.SEQ ,A.STUS_CODE ,A.LAST_LOC_ID ,C.CODE_NAME LAST_LOC_TYPE ,B.WH_LOC_DESC LAST_LOC_CODE ,A.ITM_CODE ,D.STK_DESC ,A.LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD ,A.LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT ,A.LAST_CUST_ID ,E.NAME LAST_CUST_NAME ,A.LAST_SALES_ORD_ID ,F.SALES_ORD_NO LAST_SALES_ORD_NO ,A.LAST_REQST_NO ,A.LAST_REQST_NO_ITM ,A.LAST_DELVRY_NO ,A.LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM ,A.TEMP_SCAN_NO ,A.CRT_USER_ID ,G.USER_NAME CRT_USER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(A.CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') CRT_DT ,A.UPD_USER_ID ,H.USER_NAME UPD_USER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') UPD_DT FROM LOG0101H A LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0028M B ON B.WH_LOC_ID = A.LAST_LOC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M C ON C.CODE = B.WH_LOC_GB AND C.CODE_MASTER_ID = '339' LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0026M D ON D.STK_CODE = A.ITM_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SAL0029D E ON E.CUST_ID = A.LAST_CUST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAL0001D F ON F.SALES_ORD_ID = A.LAST_SALES_ORD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M G ON G.USER_ID = A.CRT_USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M H ON H.USER_ID = A.UPD_USER_ID WHERE A.SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo} ORDER BY SEQ DESC
